name: Distressed Wood Cross
description:
The classic cross necklace that started it all! The distressed look gives it the appearance that you've already shared many adventures with it! hung on a rosary-based lace.
- Made With Love, To Show Love


•	Approximately  2 1/2” in size  
•	100% Hand-crafted
•	Made in the United States of America

name: Carved Anchor Necklace
description:
Hand carved oak anchor, guaranteed to make your life more interesting, not guaranteed to actually keep your pirate ship in place. 27" standard leather lace. 

- Made With Love, To Show Love

•	Approximately  2” in size  
•	100% Hand-crafted
•	Made in the United States of America

name: Purple Heart Necklace
description:
Show the World you have a heart, with this beautiful, one of a kind, necklace.
If the rich natural colors of the hand carved African Purple heart doesn’t do it for you, then the unique, cherry beads will.  A lot of time and love is put into each of these necklaces to give you a truly characteristic piece of jewelry that tells a story of its own.
- Made With Love, To Show Love


•	Approximately  1 1/4” in size  
•	100% Hand-crafted
•	Made in the United States of America
